name: Kinect Mouse Tracker
short: Kinect Mouse Tracker processes live Microsoft kinect data to deduce a mouse's position inside an enclosed pen.

name: Osm Contact Info Corrector
short: Osm Contact Info Corrector is a webapp to add and correct contact info on openstreetmap.

name: DSpay - Digital School Pay
short: DSpay is my high-school thesis which researches the viability and implements a prototype of a digital payment system at school.

name: Dorm Controller 9000
short: Dorm Controller 9000 smoothly wakes me up by controlling several relays and an rgb led strip using a custom HTTP server running on a ESP-12E microcontroller.

name: Sel
